content:
The Vlocity Streaming API lets you push a stream of notifications from Salesforce to client apps based on criteria that you define. It has a persistent connection that continues to deliver new data as it becomes available, rather than using client polling.

Streaming API uses push technology, transferring information initiated from a server to the client. This type of communication is opposite of polling where a request for information is made from a client to the server. The main benefits of using the Streaming API are reduced number of API calls and improved performance.

The Vlocity Streaming API types include:

* Streaming Channel: uses the Streaming API to send notifications of general events not tied to Salesforce data changes.
* PushTopic: defines a Streaming API channel based on an SOQL query that returns results notifying listeners of changes to records in a Salesforce organization.
* Platform Event: combines PushTopic and Streaming Channel, working with custom objects instead of sObjects.

You can configure a Streaming Channel Data Source, PushTopic Data Source, or Platform Event Data Source using the Vlocity Streaming API.
title: Streaming API for Vlocity
